ai-atk-s0304a3:2_1: Ambaṭṭha, the wanderer Ambaṭṭhaka, who was the senior male servant of the World, was the senior Channa called Channa.
ai-atk-s0304a3:2_2: The ending of greed is called extinguishment.
ai-atk-s0304a3:2_3: Likewise in hatred, dispelled and stepped in delusion.
ai-atk-s0304a3:3_0: and if he says, “What can be attained by this?” or “What can he say about the defilements?”
ai-atk-s0304a3:3_1: clearly he said: “Clearly, he is going to the ending of seven more.
ai-atk-s0304a3:3_2: Then he should ask: “What is the support of the world? ” and “What is their object of knowledge?
ai-atk-s0304a3:3_4: What then of these two kinds of defilement do they defilement?
ai-atk-s0304a3:3_5: They should be told, “Do not say this.”
ai-atk-s0304a3:3_6: How do they get weary of the oppressed by defilements and defilement, and oppressed by knowledge?
ai-atk-s0304a3:3_7: When he said this, it will be reply.
ai-atk-s0304a3:4_0: If you can find out the path,
ai-atk-s0304a3:4_1: For if they do not say that any defilements have ended, they might be told, “By defilements” because of their defilements are ended,” they do not say, “This is mine, oppressed,” “They’ll do not say, ‘No profitable.’ And their defilements do they say, ‘This is why it should be described.’
ai-atk-s0304a3:4_2: and because of the passions obtained it,
ai-atk-s0304a3:4_3: But that things do not because it is inappropriate for the formless, unreliable, socializing, and without defilements.
ai-atk-s0304a3:6_1: That’s why they say that greed and hate arise in them, and on the ending of greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-atk-s0304a3:7_0: Questioning in the Dhamma’s Question, the one who speaks on Dhamma,
ai-atk-s0304a3:8_0: Once they’ve given up greed and hate for the Holy One, he has gone to a good place, heavenly realm.
ai-atk-s0304a3:8_1: The purpose of completely understanding suffering is completely understood.
ai-atk-s0304a3:8_3: Which is suffering: suffering in the three forms of suffering, the suffering in the formation of suffering, and the suffering inherent in suffering.
ai-atk-s0304a3:8_4: Likewise in the case of the rest.
ai-atk-s0304a3:10_0: he enjoys the going-forth, yellow clothes, and goes forth.
ai-atk-s0304a3:10_1: “Reverend, a long time a mendicant doesn’t practice in line with the teaching, they’ll succeed in the next life. They can attain Arahantship, regardless of whether they haven’t attained Arahantship, the perfected one, and the one who brings them Liberation.”
ai-atk-s0304a3:11_0: The Linked Discourses with Jambukhādaka is finished.
